subject: URGENT: Your Account Will Be Suspended
body: Dear Customer, We have detected suspicious activity on your account. Click here immediately to verify your identity: http://secure-verify-account.tk/login.php?user=confirm&token=abc123. You have 24 hours to respond or your account will be permanently closed. Please enter your username, password, and SSN to continue.

subject: ACTION REQUIRED: Confirm Payment Details
body: Your recent transaction of $5,432.00 has been flagged. To avoid account suspension, please confirm your banking details immediately at http://payment-security-center.ml/verify. Enter your full credit card number, CVV, and PIN. This is urgent and must be completed within 2 hours.

subject: You've Won $1,000,000 - Claim Now!
body: Congratulations! You have been selected as the grand prize winner in our international lottery. Click here to claim your prize: http://winner-claim-portal.ga/prize?id=987654. Please provide your bank account details and routing number for immediate fund transfer. Act now, offer expires today!

subject: SECURITY ALERT: Unusual Login Detected
body: We noticed an unauthorized login attempt from Nigeria. Verify your account now at http://account-security-verify.cf/login or we will freeze your funds. Enter your password and answer security questions immediately. Failure to comply will result in permanent account deletion.

subject: Your PayPal account has been limited
body: Dear PayPal user, Your account access has been restricted due to unusual activity. Click here to restore access: http://paypal-secure-login.tk/restore?id=user123. You must verify your identity by entering your email, password, bank account, and SSN within 12 hours.

subject: IRS: Immediate Action Required for Tax Refund
body: This is the Internal Revenue Service. You are eligible for a tax refund of $4,567. Click here to claim: http://irs-refund-claim.ml/form?ssn=verify. Enter your Social Security Number, date of birth, and bank details. Failure to respond within 48 hours will void your refund.

subject: Your package could not be delivered - USPS
body: USPS attempted to deliver your package but failed. Pay the shipping fee of $2.99 to reschedule delivery: http://usps-redelivery.tk/pay?track=xyz789. Enter your credit card information to proceed. Package will be returned to sender if not claimed within 24 hours.

subject: Microsoft Account Security Code - Verify Now
body: Your Microsoft account security has been compromised. Click here immediately: http://microsoft-security-center.cf/verify?code=urgent. Enter your full email and password to secure your account. Suspicious activity detected from unknown location. Act now!
